title: Extract information from testthat results â€” CompileTestResults
code: # Generate a test results object.  # lTestResults <- testthat::test_local( #  stop_on_failure = FALSE, #  reporter = "silent" # )  lTestResults <- structure(   list(     list(       file = "test-file1.R",       test = "First test with one GH issue (#32)",       results = list(         structure(           list(),           class = c("expectation_success", "expectation", "condition")         )       )     ),     list(       file = "test-file1.R",       test = "Second test with two GH issues (#32, #45)",       results = list(         structure(           list(),           class = c("expectation_failure", "expectation", "error", "condition")         )       )     )   ),   class = "testthat_results" ) CompileTestResults(lTestResults) #> # A tibble: 2 Ã— 4 #>   Test                                      File         Disposition Issues    #> * <chr>                                     <chr>        <fct>       <list>    #> 1 First test with one GH issue (#32)        test-file1.R pass        <int [1]> #> 2 Second test with two GH issues (#32, #45) test-file1.R fail        <int [2]>

title: Printing qcthat objects â€” printing
text: One main purposes qcthat produce user-friendly reports package's issue test statuses. Printing issue-test matrix provides nested view relationship milestones, issues, tests, well state issues ("open", "closed (completed)", "closed (fix)") disposition tests ("passed", "failed", "skipped").

Additional arguments passed methods. lglUseEmoji (length-1 logical) Whether use emojis (TRUE emoji package installed) ASCII indicators (FALSE) output. default, determined qcthat.emoji option, defaults TRUE. lglShowMilestones (length-1 logical) Whether separate issues milestones reports. lglShowIgnoredLabels (length-1 logical) Whether show information reports issue labels ("qcthat-nocov") ignored. fnTransform (function) function transform output returning . default, base::identity() format() (returns formatted output), base::writeLines() print() (sends output stdout()).

title: Parameters used in multiple functions â€” shared-params
text: chrChecks (character) Items user check. preceded checkboxes associated issue. chrClass (character) Class name(s) assign object. chrCommitSHAs (character) SHAs git commits. chrIgnoredLabels (character) GitHub labels ignore, "qcthat-nocov". chrInstructions (character) Instructions review issue. Included associated issue checklist. chrKeywords (character) Keywords search just issue numbers commit messages. Defaults GitHub issue-linking keywords chrLabels (character) name(s) labels(s) use. chrMilestones (character) name(s) milestone(s) filter issues . chrSourcePath (character) Components path source file. file extension included filename omitted (sent separate piece vector). chrTargetPath (character) Components path target file. file extension included filename omitted (sent separate piece vector). chrTests (character) vector test descriptions CompileIssueTestMatrix() matrix. dfITM (qcthat_IssueTestMatrix) qcthat_IssueTestMatrix object returned AsIssueTestMatrix(). dfRepoIssues (qcthat_Issues data frame) Data frame GitHub issues returned FetchRepoIssues(). dfTestResults (qcthat_TestResults data frame) Data frame test results returned CompileTestResults(). envCall (environment) environment use error reporting. Typically set rlang::caller_env(). envErrorMessage (environment) environment pass glue::glue() resolve variables. fctDisposition (factor) Disposition factor levels c("fail", "skip", "pass"). intIssue (length-1 integer) issue check associated. intIssues (integer) vector issue numbers CompileIssueTestMatrix() matrix GitHub. intMaxCommits (length-1 integer) maximum number commits return git logs. Leaving default almost always fine, can reduce number repository long commit history function slow. intParentIssue (length-1 integer) number issue child issue attach. intPRNumber (length-1 integer) number pull request fetch information . intPRNumbers (integer) vector pull request numbers. lIssuesNonPR (list) List issue objects returned RemovePRsFromIssues(). lTestResults (testthat_results) testthat test results object, typically obtained running something like testthat::test_local() stop_on_failure = FALSE reporter cause issues parallel testing, like reporter = "silent", assigning name. lglOverwrite (length-1 logical) Whether overwrite files already exist. lglShowMilestones (length-1 logical) Whether separate issues milestones reports. lglShowIgnoredLabels (length-1 logical) Whether show information reports issue labels ("qcthat-nocov") ignored. lglUseEmoji (length-1 logical) Whether use emojis (TRUE emoji package installed) ASCII indicators (FALSE) output. default, determined qcthat.emoji option, defaults TRUE. lglWarn (length-1 logical) Whether warn extra value included filter (report still returns results). Defaults TRUE. objShape (0-row data.frame, etc) Object expected structure. strBody (length-1 character) body issue, GitHub markdown. strChildIssueID (length-1 character) id field issue connect parent issue. strConditionSubclass (length-1 character) subclass condition. strConditionClass (length-1 character) One "error", "warning", "message". strErrorSubclass (length-1 character) subclass error condition. strErrorMessage (length-1 character) message include error report. Can include glue::glue() syntax. strExtension (length-1 character) file extension use target file. target path already includes extension, replaced value. value already correct, effect. strFailureMode (length-1 character) Whether "ignore" failures (default) "fail" (show failure testthat tests). strGHToken (length-1 character) GitHub token permissions read issues. strOwner (length-1 character) GitHub username organization name. strPkgRoot (length-1 character) path directory package. expanded using gert::git_find(). strRepo (length-1 character) GitHub repository name. strSourceRef (length-1 character) Name git reference contains changes. Defaults active branch repository. strState (length-1 character) State issues pull requests fetch. Must one "open", "closed", "". Defaults "open" pull requests "" issues. strTargetRef (length-1 character) Name git reference merged . Defaults default branch repository. strTitle (length-1 character) title issue.

title: qcthat 0.2.0
text: complete rewrite package implement framework links GitHub issues evidence issues implemented.

title: qcthat 0.2.0
text: Function FetchRepoIssues() get issues GitHub repository compile user-friendly data frame (#34, #47). Function CompileTestResults() extract test results testthat test runs compile user-friendly data frame (#32). Function CompileIssueTestMatrix() link GitHub issues test results, producing IssueTestMatrix object summarizes state issues associated tests (#35, #49). Custom print methods qcthat_SingleIssueTestResults, qcthat_Milestone, qcthat_IssueTestMatrix objects display contents user-friendly tree format (#31, #36, #45, #60, #61).
